name: Mantle (itch)
description:
When the weight of responsibility takes you down a dangerous path. When the pressure on your shoulders keeps you moving another step forward. When the MANTLE of responsibility you wear is to save the world, to save others or just to save yourself. Will this be your fate, to be lost in the lowest depths and darkness or will you take control of your path.

Make an adventure down to the deepest and darkest depths of the Earth using your teleportation device to overcome any challenges and obstacles. Platform your way through hand-made pixel art levels. Take the risk to teleport your way through as fast as you can.

  • Controller strongly recommended. 
  • Fast and precise platforming gameplay.
  • Over 30 Levels.
  • Dozens of different dangerous obstacles to overcome.
